headline: Operations Research Analyst at U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE)
summary:
(Currently hold an Active TS/SCI-CI Poly clearance)
Experienced Geographer/Data Scientist with a demonstrated history of working in the federal government. Skilled in Python, Java, R, SQL, Data Visualization, and Big Data. Strong information technology professional with a Masterâs Degree in Data Science from The George Washington University.

positions.description:
(Federal Employee on a Permanent Appointment)

â¢ Lead and drive a 11 contractor personnel team in complex data modeling, mining, and visualization initiatives
â¢ Support development of advance web-based business intelligence dashboards, ETL processing scripts, and database management scripts using python, R, SQL, and Tableau

positions.title: Operations Research Analyst

positions.description:
(Federal Employee on a Term Appointment)

â¢ Support a research and development branch with updating and innovating Big Data, while improving data visualization methodologies
â¢ Develop applications in Python to ingest and analyze large geo-spatial data sets using a combination of ETL workspaces and custom developed parallel programming scripts 
â¢ Perform exploratory data analysis (EDA) with R statistical computing and SQL
â¢ Experiment implementation of machine learning algorithms using Scikit-learn and Tensorflow
â¢ Assist the Hidden Unit Task Force with the identification of hidden housing units for 2020 enumeration by utilizing ArcMap, near-infrared (NIR) imagery and Light Detection and Ranging (LiDAR) imagery, and Python Arcpy scripting
â¢ Query and update the Master Address File/Topologically Integrated Geographic Encoding and Referencing (MAF/TIGER) database and the Geographic Acquis-based Topological Real-time Editing System (GATRES)
positions.title: Geographer

positions.description:
(Federal Employee on a Term Appointment)

â¢ Act as the primary technology liaison/business analyst for the Disaster Assistance division's  Office of the Director
â¢ Provide expertise in technical assistance to support the design and development of USDA's GIS Food Assistance and Agricultural Development Analysis System (FADAS) and the design and development of FAS's SharePoint workspace as a primary government POC for various contractors such as Esri
â¢ Develop and co-author GIS StoryMaps used for executive management and Congress
â¢ Assist in a streamlined data integration of the USDA FAS's Grantor management system and FAS's SharePoint workspace to allow the flexibility of big data tracking, analytics, and enterprise searching
â¢ Upgrade the USDA-FAS's SharePoint User Interface from 2007 to 2010
positions.title: International Program Specialist

positions.description:
â¢ Supported the international business development team in providing competitive and market intelligence that influenced strategies to support business winning goals of the Air and Missile Defense division
â¢ Design and implement content updates such as guidance and advisories to financial institutions on  FinCEN.gov, 314a Financial Regulators website, and the FinCEN Registered User Portal used by all domestic law enforcement agencies
â¢ Assisted Senior Solution Architects with the development of open source intelligence (OSINT) analytical software by performing operational research, planning analysis, and financial intelligence (FININT) analysis such as predictive analytics
â¢ Lead the design and development of a Project Management Portal that followed a standardized project management framework based from the Project Management Institute (PMI) on Microsoft SharePoint for the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA)
positions.title: Competitive Intelligence Analyst/Web Developer

positions.companyName: Dept of the Treasury/Financial Crimes Enforcement Network
positions.description:
â¢Analyzed Bank Secrecy Act (BSA) data detecting, identifying, and targeting irregularities of potential money laundering related to terrorist financing or transnational organized crime with various FinCEN tools
